channel.title: The Arthur Podcast
channel.description:
Arthur Read is back and starting his own podcast! Listen in as he shares his favorite adventures with, DW, Buster and all their friends from around Elwood City.
 
The Arthur Podcast is produced by GBH Kids and Gen-Z Media and distributed by PBS KIDS and PRX.

image.title: The Arthur Podcast
image.description: Arthur's making a podcast with his friends! Listen in to their adventures in Elwood City.

channel.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids
channel.itunes:subtitle: Arthur's making a podcast with his friends! Listen in to their adventures in Elwood City.
channel.itunes:summary:
Arthur Read is back and starting his own podcast! Listen in as he shares his favorite adventures with, DW, Buster and all their friends from around Elwood City.
The Arthur Podcast is produced by GBH Kids and Gen-Z Media and distributed by PBS KIDS and PRX.

item.title: 306 - Mr. Ratburn and the Special Someone
item.description: Arthur’s third grade class is shocked when they discover that Mr. Ratburn is getting married. When they overhear Mr. Ratburn talking about a wedding with a woman named Patty, the kids worry that he’s marrying someone even tougher than he is!
item.itunes:title: Mr. Ratburn and the Special Someone
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur’s third grade class is shocked when they discover that Mr. Ratburn is getting married.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids

item.title: 305 How the Cookie Crumbles
item.description: Muffy is determined to win the cookie competition at this year’s Strawberry Festival. Together with her friends, she makes the perfect batch of cookies with a brand new recipe. But she’ll have to decide which is more important: getting all the credit, or keeping her friends!
item.itunes:title: How the Cookie Crumbles
item.itunes:subtitle: Muffy is determined to win the cookie competition at this year’s Strawberry Festival.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids
item.itunes:summary: Muffy is determined to win the cookie competition at this year’s Strawberry Festival. Together with her friends, she makes the perfect batch of cookies with a brand new recipe. But she’ll have to decide which is more important: getting all the credit, or keeping her friends!
item.content:encoded: Muffy is determined to win the cookie competition at this year’s Strawberry Festival. Together with her friends, she makes the perfect batch of cookies with a brand new recipe. But she’ll have to decide which is more important: getting all the credit, or keeping her friends!

item.title: 304 - Arthur's Big Meltdown
item.description: Arthur is usually pretty calm, but even the most mild-mannered kid gets upset sometimes! When his friends ruin his brand new pair of sneakers, Arthur flips out. Will he be able to salvage his reputation—and his friendships?
item.itunes:title: Arthur's Big Meltdown
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur is usually pretty calm, but even the most mild-mannered kid gets upset sometimes!
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids

item.title: 303 - Arthur's New Old Vacation
item.description: Arthur’s family goes on the same summer vacation every year to Codpocket Lake. But this year, Arthur wants to go to the pirate-themed amusement park: Dead Man’s Cove. Can he convince his family to change up their usual vacation destination?
item.itunes:title: Arthur's New Old Vacation
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur’s family goes on the same summer vacation every year to Codpocket Lake. But this year, Arthur wants to go to the pirate-themed amusement park.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)

item.title: 302 - The Case of the Girl with the Long Face
item.description: Fern has been feeling down, but none of her friends know why! Buster Baxter, private eye, is determined to get to the bottom of the mystery.
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Girl with the Long Face
item.itunes:subtitle: Fern has been feeling down, but none of her friends know why!
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)

item.title: 301-Desk Wars
item.description: It’s the hottest school day of the year and tempers are even hotter! The tension comes to a head when Mr. Ratburn moves Brain and Arthur away from their usual desks and sets off the most dramatic desk war in third grade history!
item.itunes:title: Desk Wars
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s the hottest school day of the year and tempers are even hotter!
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)

item.title: Introducing The Arthur Podcast Season 3!
item.description: The Arthur Podcast is back with a third season! Fans of PBS KIDS podcast can join Arthur, D.W., and Buster new adventures based off the classic television series. New episodes release on Thursday.
item.itunes:title: Introducing The Arthur Podcast Season 3!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Arthur Podcast is back with a brand-new season! Fans of PBS KIDS podcast can join Arthur, D.W., and Buster new adventures based off the classic television series.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids
item.itunes:summary: The Arthur Podcast is back with a third season! Fans of PBS KIDS podcast can join Arthur, D.W., and Buster new adventures based off the classic television series. New episodes release on Thursday.
item.content:encoded: The Arthur Podcast is back with a third season! Fans of PBS KIDS podcast can join Arthur, D.W., and Buster new adventures based off the classic television series. New episodes release on Thursday.

item.title: Introducing - Keyshawn Solves It
item.description: If you love the The Arthur Podcast, then GBH Kids has a new show you’re sure to enjoy: Keyshawn Solves It. Created by Ed Jenkins, the Keyshawn Solves It podcast is an 8-episode serialized mystery about a 10-year-old African-American boy who inherits a set of keys that can unlock almost any door. With help from his friend Kiki, Keyshawn uses these keys to help solve the mystery of disappearing bikes in his North Minneapolis neighborhood, ensuring that his community’s Juneteenth bike parade can go on. Listeners will be introduced to Juneteenth and its origins, as well as to “keys to success” life lessons such as resilience, self-worth, and responsibility. Geared to children 5-9, Keyshawn Solves It is produced by GBH Kids and distributed by PRX and PBS KIDS. Funding is made possible in part by Black Public Media.
item.itunes:title: Introducing - Keyshawn Solves It
item.itunes:subtitle: If you love the The Arthur Podcast, then GBH Kids has a new show you’re sure to enjoy: Keyshawn Solves It!

With help from his friend Kiki, Keyshawn uses these keys to help solve the mystery of disappearing bikes in his North Minneapolis neighborhood, ensuring that his community’s Juneteenth bike parade can go on. Created by Ed Jenkins, the Keyshawn Solves It podcast is an 8-episode serialized mystery about a 10-year-old African-American boy who inherits a set of keys that can unlock almost any door. With help from his friend Kiki, Keyshawn uses these keys to help solve the mystery of disappearing bikes in his North Minneapolis neighborhood, ensuring that his community’s Juneteenth bike parade can go on. Listeners will be introduced to Juneteenth and its origins, as well as to “keys to success” life lessons such as resilience, self-worth, and responsibility. Geared to children 5-9, Keyshawn Solves It is produced by GBH Kids and distributed by PRX and PBS KIDS. Funding is made possible in part by Black Public Media.

item.title: S2 E6 Speak Up, Francine
item.description: After discovering that the local creek is polluted, Francine is determined to get the word out during Elwood City’s Earth Day Rally. But will her fear of public speaking get in her way?
item.itunes:title: Speak Up, Francine
item.itunes:subtitle: After discovering that the local creek is polluted, Francine is determined to get the word out during Elwood City’s Earth Day Rally.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids

item.title: S2 E5 Lend Me Your Ear
item.description: Mr. Ratburn is acting strangely, and Arthur, Buster, and Brain are worried. The kids work together to get to the bottom of Mr. Ratburn’s odd behavior!
item.itunes:title: Lend Me Your Ear
item.itunes:subtitle: Mr. Ratburn is acting strangely, and Arthur, Buster, and Brain are worried.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids

item.title: S2 E4 Staycation
item.description: Mr. and Mrs. Read have to cancel their vacation when they can’t find a babysitter for Arthur, DW, and Baby Kate. To help cheer their parents up, the kids plan a staycation for them in their own backyard.
item.itunes:title: Staycation
item.itunes:subtitle: Mr. and Mrs. Read have to cancel their vacation when they can’t find a babysitter for Arthur, DW.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)

item.title: S2 E3 DW’s Bad Mood
item.description: DW is acting even crankier than usual, and it’s up to Arthur and Francine to get to the bottom of what’s causing her bad mood.
item.itunes:title: DW’s Bad Mood
item.itunes:subtitle: DW is acting even crankier than usual, and it’s up to Arthur and Francine to get to the bottom of what’s causing her bad mood.

item.title: S2 E2 The World Record
item.description: Arthur and his friends want to break a world record, but can’t seem to agree on which record to break!
item.itunes:title: The World Record
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur and his friends want to break a world record, but can’t seem to agree on which record to break!

item.title: S2 E1 Arthur’s Pet Business
item.description: To prove to his parents that he’s responsible enough to have a dog of his own, Arthur creates his own pet sitting business. But managing all these pets turns out to be harder than he bargained for!
item.itunes:title: Arthur’s Pet Business
item.itunes:subtitle: To prove to his parents that he’s responsible enough to have a dog of his own, Arthur creates his own pet sitting business.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)

item.title: Announcing Season 2 of The Arthur Podcast!
item.description:
The Arthur Podcast is back with a brand-new season! Fans of PBS KIDS podcast can join Arthur, D.W., and Buster new adventures based off the classic television series.

The Arthur Podcast is produced by GBH Kids and Gen-Z Media in partnership with PRX.

Find more at www.pbskids.org/arthur

item.title: S1 E8 Crunch Cereal
item.description: Arthur is determined to win the new Crunch Cereal Jingle contest! All he needs is a band…and lyrics…and a melody.
item.itunes:title: Crunch Cereal
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur wants to win the new Crunch Cereal Jingle contest! He just needs a good idea.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids
item.itunes:summary: Arthur is determined to win the new Crunch Cereal Jingle contest! All he needs is a band…and lyrics…and a melody.

item.title: S1 E7 Long Dull Winter
item.description: When Arthur and his friends catch a case of the winter blues, they decide that having a holiday to celebrate is the only way to cure it. Since there are no major holidays coming up, they take it upon themselves to create a brand new one!
item.itunes:title: Long Dull Winter
item.itunes:subtitle: Elwood City is due for a new holiday, so Arthur and his friends pitch their some ideas!
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids
item.itunes:summary: When Arthur and his friends catch a case of the winter blues, they decide that having a holiday to celebrate is the only way to cure it. Since there are no major holidays coming up, they take it upon themselves to create a brand new one!

item.title: S1 E6 Locked in the Library
item.description: Francine is upset with Arthur and refuses to speak to him. Being in a fight with your best friend is hard enough, but things take a turn for the worst when they both get locked inside the Elwood City Library for the weekend!
item.itunes:title: Locked in the Library
item.itunes:subtitle: Francine is really mad at Arthur. Can she forgive him when they get locked in the library?
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids
item.itunes:summary: Francine is upset with Arthur and refuses to speak to him. Being in a fight with your best friend is hard enough, but things take a turn for the worst when they both get locked inside the Elwood City Library for the weekend!

item.title: S1 E5 Arthur's New Baby
item.description: Arthur is not excited when his parents announce that they’ll be having another baby. One little sister is more than enough! Will he be able to win Baby Kate over, or will he have another D.W. to contend with?
item.itunes:title: Arthur's New Baby
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur is nervous when his parents say they're having a new baby! Will she be another D.W.?
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids

item.title: S1 E4 Arthur's Snow Biz
item.description: It’s snowing in Elwood City, and Arthur’s new shoveling business is booming…that is, until Buster tries to get in on the action. Now the friends must compete to be the best shoveler on the block!
item.itunes:title: Arthur's Snow Biz
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur and Buster's friendship gets icy after they start a snow shoveling business.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids

item.title: S1 E3 Buster's Secret Admirer
item.description: Buster receives a box of chocolates in the mail. Who could they be from? He’ll need Arthur’s help to discover who his secret admirer is.
item.itunes:title: Buster's Secret Admirer
item.itunes:subtitle: Buster needs to identify his secret admirer after they send him a box of chocolates.
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)

item.title: S1 E2 Scare-Your-Pants-Off
item.description: When a group called “Parents Against Weird Stories” try to ban the “Scare-Your-Pants-Off” books, it’s up to Arthur and his friends to save their favorite book series!
item.itunes:title: Scare-Your-Pants-Off
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur and his friends must rally together to save their favorite series of spooky books!
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)

item.title: S1 E1 Spelling Trubble
item.description: Arthur is surprised when he and Brain are chosen to represent Mr. Ratburn’s class in the school-wide spellathon. Arthur didn’t study! How will he be able to compete against the smartest kid in the school and last year’s reigning champ?
item.itunes:title: Spelling Trubble
item.itunes:subtitle: Arthur's participating in the school-wide spellathon. But will he be up to the challenge?
item.author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (GBH & PBS Kids)
item.itunes:author: GBH & PBS Kids

item.title: S1 E0 Arthur Makes a Podcast
item.description:
Arthur's making his own podcast and is excited to share the news with D.W. and you! Listen to his new series starting October 20th wherever you find podcasts.

The Arthur Podcast is produced by GBH Kids and Gen-Z Media.
